title: Growing Old Together
story: Nancy wants to live a long time. She wants to live for one hundred years. She is five years old now. She wants to live 95 more years. Then she will be 100. Her father is 30 years old. He wants to live a long time, too. He wants to live for one hundred years. He wants to live for 70 more years. "Daddy, we will grow old together, okay?" Nancy said to her father. "Yes, honey, we will grow old together," he said to Nancy. Then Nancy smiled. She gave her daddy a big hug.
summary: A heartwarming story about a young girl named Nancy who dreams of living a long life and growing old together with her father.
image: An illustration of Nancy and her father smiling and hugging each other.
